channel.title: Hi I'm Brandon and I like to build stuff
channel.description:
Hi! I'm Brandon Hilkert. I’ve been in technology for about 10 years now – the last handful doing Ruby development. I’m passionate about everything web.
At some point in there, I got involved with startups and building products. While I don’t have a list of impressive acquisitions to share, I love it and can’t imagine myself doing anything else.
I've been working on writing a book and blogged about my experiences thus far at [http://brandonhilkert.com][1]
[1]: http://brandonhilkert.com
